{{refimprove|date=July 2010}} {{Infobox TV channel | name = Disney Channel Greece | logofile = Disney Channel wordmark.svg | logosize = 200px | launch = November 7, 2009 | owner = [[Disney-ABC Television Group]] | country = [[Greece]] | broadcast area = [[Greece]]
[[Cyprus]] | picture format = [[4:3]] ([[576i]], [[SDTV]]) | language = [[Greek language|Greek]]
[[English language|English]] (There are also available Greek subtitles in some shows and movies) | former names = | replaced names = | sister names = [[Disney XD (Greece)|Disney XD]]
[[Disney Junior (Greece)]] | web = [http://www.disney.gr/ www.disney.gr] | sat serv 1 = [[NOVA Greece]] | sat chan 1 = Channel 504 | sat serv 2 = [[NOVA Cyprus]] | sat chan 2 = Channel 404 | sat serv 3 = [[OTE TV]] | sat chan 3 = Channel 501 | cable serv 1 = [[Cablenet]](Cyprus) | adsl serv 1 = [[OTE TV]] | adsl chan 1 = Channel 51 | adsl serv 2 = [[CytaVision]](Cyprus) | adsl chan 2 = Channel 7 }} '''Disney Channel''' launched on November 7, 2009 and is available to the subscribers of [[Conn-x TV]] and [[NOVA Greece|Nova Greece]] in [[Greece]] and in [[Cyprus]] it is available in [[Cytavision]], [[Cablenet]] and [[NOVA Cyprus|Nova Cyprus]]. In Greece, the [[Playhouse Disney (Greece)|Playhouse Disney]] block programming will continue to be broadcast by state owned [[Hellenic Broadcasting Corporation|ERT]] as well as on the Disney Channel. It's worth mentioning that the most shows can be watched on [[Hellenic Broadcasting Corporation|ERT]]. The channel has a huge success in Greece and it has the most views of [[NOVA Greece|Nova's]] children channels. On May 1, 2011 it changed logo. On June 1, 2011 , [[Playhouse Disney (Greece)|Playhouse Disney]], the block renamed [[Disney Junior (Greece)|Disney Junior]]. ==Shows== '''Current''' *[[The Fairly Odd Parents]] *[[Brandy & Mr. Whiskers]] *[[Walt Disney Cartoon Classics#Limited Gold Editions|Classic Cartoons]] *[[Have a Laugh!]] *[[The Emperor's New School]] *[[Kim Possible]] *[[Phineas & Ferb]] *[[The Replacements (TV series)|The Replacements]] *[[Stitch!]] *[[So Random!]] *[[My Babysitter's a Vampire (TV series)|My Babysitter's a Vampire]] *[[Fish Hooks]] *[[Good Luck Charlie]] *[[Hannah Montana]] *[[JONAS L.A.]] *[[Sonny With a Chance]] *[[Shake It Up (TV series)|Shake It Up]] *[[The Suite Life Of Zack And Cody]] *[[The Suite Life on Deck]] *[[Wizards of Waverly Place]] *[[Jake & Blake]] '''Former''' * [[American Dragon: Jake Long]] * [[Famous 5: On the Case]] * [[I Got a Rocket!]] * [[Brian O'Brian]] * [[Cory in the House]] * [[Jonas Brothers: Living the Dream]] * [[Studio DC: Almost Live]] ===Upcoming Series=== * ''[[A.N.T. Farm]]''http://www.disneychannelmedianet.com/DNR/2010/doc/dc_af_111110.doc * ''[[PrankStars]]'' * ''[[Jessie (TV series)|Jessie]]''http://www.disneychannelmedianet.com/dnr/2011/dc_kids_fam_2011_upfront.doc{{cite web|url=http://www.tvguide.com/News/Debby-Ryan-Suite-Life-1031460.aspx |title=Debby Ryan Teases a Suite Life Graduation Tearjerker |publisher=[[TV Guide]] |date=April 4, 2011 |accessdate=April 7, 2011}} with interview video confirms pre-production status. (Series is currently in pre-production, tentative Fall 2011 date.) * ''[[Austin and Ally]]''http://disneyinfonet.com/2010/12/08/disney-channel-orders-pilot-for-new-show/ * ''Gravity Falls'' (Spring 2012)http://www.disneychannelmedianet.com/DNR/2010/doc/dc_new_120810.doc * '' [[Madison High]]''http://www.deadline.com/2010/11/disney-channel-preps-first-musical-series/#more-83717http://www.disneychannelmedianet.com/DNR/2011/madison_021711.doc (Pilot filmed in March 2011, if picked up, it will premiere in early 2012) ===Upcoming Movies=== *[[The Suite Life Movie]] *[[Good Luck Charlie: The Movie]] ==Programming blocks== ===Disney Junior Morning Block=== {{main|Disney Junior (Greece)}} Disney Junior Morning block broadcasts from 6 a.m. till 10 30' a.m. [[GR]]. ===Film Time! block=== Film Time! block airs Disney Animation Movies, Disney Channel Original Movies and some Walt Disney Films. Film Time! block broadcasts every Tuesday at 6:45 p.m. [[GR]], Friday at 6:45 p.m [[GR]], and Saturday and Sunday at 08:50 a.m and 7:10 p.m [[GR]]. ====Current films==== *[[Brother Bear 2]] *[[Camp Rock]] *[[Camp Rock 2: The Final Jam]] *[[Twitches (film)|Twitches]] *[[Twitches Too]] *[[Cadet Kelly]] *[[High School Musical]] *[[High School Musical 2]] *[[High School Musical: El Desafio]] *[[The Thirteenth Year]] *[[Wendy Wu: Homecoming Warrior]] *[[Go Figure (film)|Go Figure]] *[[Halloweentown (film)|Halloweentown]] *[[The Cheetah Girls (film)|The Cheetah Girls]] *[[The Cheetah Girls 2]] *[[The Cheetah Girls: One World]] *[[Minutemen]] *[[Stitch! The Movie]] *[[Toy Story]] *[[Toy Story 2]] *[[Tinker Bell and the Lost Treasure]] *[[Tinker Bell and the Great Fairy Rescue]] *[[Hatching Pete]] *[[Pixel Perfect]] *[[Princess Protection Program]] *[[Dadnapped]] *[[Wizards of Waverly Place: The Movie]] *[[Starstruck (2010 film)|Starstruck]] *[[Snow Buddies]] *[[Read it and Weep]] *[[Johnny Tsunami]] *[[Johnny Kapahala: Back on Board]] *[[Jump In!]] *[[Den Brother]] *[[Harriet the Spy: Blog Wars]] *[[16 Wishes]] *[[Avalon High]] *[[Lemonade Mouth (film)|Lemonade Mouth]] *[[Sharpay's Fabulous Adventure]] *[[Beauty and the Beast (1991 film)|Beauty and the Beast]] *[[Phineas and Ferb: Across the Second Dimension]] ==Special events== ===Camp Rock block=== On 18 October 2010, Disney Channel Greece premiered ''[[Camp Rock 2: The Final Jam]]'', and premiered the new shows: ''[[JONAS L.A.]]'', two new episodes, and ''[[Hannah Montana Forever]]'' (Hannah Montana's final season, season4), 2 new episodes. ===Halloween 2010=== Disney Channel Greece, on Halloween 2010, aired a special Halloween episode of the Disney channel original series ''[[Wizards of Waverly Place]]'',and a new ''[[Hannah Montana Forever]]'' and ''[[JONAS L.A.]]'' episodes. And Disney Channel ME aired the Original Movie ''Tinker Bell and the Great Fairy Rescue''. The Sunday, the channel aired the original movie ''[[Halloweentown]]'' at 19:10. ===Brothers-And-Sisters-Block=== On November 27, 2010, Disney Channel Greece aired a special block filled with special episodes from the Disney channel original series''[[Wizards of Waverly place]]'',''[[Hannah Montana]]'',''[[Jonas]]'', ''[[Jonas L.A.]]'', ''[[The Suite Life on Deck]]'', ''[[Phineas and Ferb]]'' and others. It was also the premiere of Disney Channel Original Movie ''[[Den Brother]]'' at 8:50. ===Camp rock week-end Block=== On December 11, 2010, Disney Channel Greece aired brand new episodes of ''[[Jonas L.A.]]'' and others shows. It aired also the Disney Channel original movie ''[[Camp Rock 2: The Final Jam]]'' but, with the unseen scenes. ===Christmas Block=== On Christmas 2010, Disney Channel Greece aired the premiere of the Disney channel original movie ''[[Harriet the Spy: Blog Wars]]'' starring ''[[Wizards of Waverly place]] actor ''[[Jennifer Stone]] as [[Harper Finkle]] and ''[[16 Wishes]] starring [[Debby Ryan]]. Disney Channel Greece also aired the premiere of [[Phineas and Ferb|Phineas and Ferb: Christmas Vacation]]. ===Shake it Up and Fish Hooks Weekend=== On February 27 2011, Disney Channel Greece aired many new episodes of both shows. ===Candace Day=== On March 5, 2011, Disney Channel Greece aired episodes of [[Phineas and Ferb]] that focus on Candace. ===Fashion Week=== From March 7 to March 13, 2011, Disney Channel Greece premieres the most fashionable episodes of Disney channel shows. ==Availability== *In Greece it is available on [[NOVA Greece]] and [[Conn-x TV]]. *In Cyprus it is available on [[NOVA Cyprus]], [[Cytavision]] and [[Cablenet]]. ==Picture formats== It was announced that in 2010, Disney Channel Greece will be broadcasting in [[High-definition television|High Definition]] but it never happened so far. ==See also== *[[Disney XD Greece]] *[[Playhouse Disney (Greece)]] *[[Playhouse Disney]] *[[Disney Channel Original Movies]] *[[Walt Disney Pictures]] ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.disney.gr/ Disney official site] *[http://www.disneyxd.gr/ Disney XD official site] {{Disney Channel}} {{Television in Greece}} [[Category:Disney Channel]] [[Category:Television channels in Greece]] [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 2009]] [[Category:Greek-language television stations]] [[pt:Disney Channel Grecia]]
